name: Hide And Seek (itch) (Yahaha Official)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and Macos

Hide And Seek:

In traditional Hide-and-seek gameplay, try to transform into something special and hide to avoid the catcher's eye. Come to play with your friends and defeat them with your observant eyes!

WASD: Walk Left Click: Attack Space Bar: Jump Shift: Speed walk Tab: Setting FAQ

Q: How to know about upcoming game releases in advance？

A: If you want to be notified when our next game releases and gain early access on future projects, add your email to the list:

https://forms.gle/qF6bM49tGz2tWXcC7

in addition, You can find our Discord link on our game homepage, or click the link:

https://discord.gg/yahaha-766277288902918144

Q: Why should I join your Discord community?

A: Our Discord community is a great place to interact with other players, provide feedback, get game update news, and interact with our development team. In addition, we will not regularly distribute benefits within the discord.

Q: What can I find in the Discord community? 

A: In our Discord community, you can find other players, our development team, and other game-related content, such as update news, events, and competitions. We encourage players to actively participate in our community, as this will help us improve the game and provide a better experience.
